result.name: LiveJournal Amnesia
result.summary: A quick script to mark all of my old high school LiveJournal posts as private.
result.description: LiveJournal Amnesia is a quick script I wrote to automate the process of hiding the 200-some LiveJournal blog posts I generated in my late teens. It uses a public gem to talk to the LiveJournal API. Check out the README on GitHub for more info then you, too, can pretend like you never wrote that poem Junior year!
